tokens.text: specifies the color grading settings for Vibrant Visuals mode

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Client Biome Color Grading Identifier
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Set the identifier used for color grading in Vibrant Visuals mode. Identifiers must resolve to identifiers in valid Color Grading JSON schemas under the "color_grading" directory. Biomes without this component will have default color_grading settings.

fields.title: Color Grading Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of color_grading definition to use
